tv.amwa.maj.io.mxf.impl

Class PartitionImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • tv.amwa.maj.io.mxf.impl.PartitionImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Partition
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EssencePartitionImpl, FooterPartitionImpl

    public abstract class PartitionImpl
extends Object
implements Partition, Cloneable

    Data relating to a single MXF partition.

      • setPartitionPackPadding

        public abstract void setPartitionPackPadding(long paddingFillSize)
                                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: Partition

        Set the amount of padding to include after each significant entry in the partition, allowing space for the metadata to expand over time.

        Specified by:
        setPartitionPackPadding in interface Partition
        Parameters:
        paddingFillSize - Size of padding to include after the partition.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Cannot set the padding size to a negative value.
        See Also:
        Padded.getPaddingFillSize(), Padded.setPaddingFillSize(long)

        public boolean hasHeaderMetadata()
        Description copied from interface: Partition

        Determines whether this partition contains header metadata. All header partitions must contain header metadata. Other partitions may contain header metadata.

        Specified by:

      • readHeaderMetadata

        public HeaderMetadata readHeaderMetadata()
                                  throws NullPointerException
        Description copied from interface: Partition

        Returns the header metadata contained within the partition, if any.

        Specified by:
        readHeaderMetadata in interface Partition
        Returns:
        Header metadata of this partition, or null if no header metadata is present.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - The partition's MXF file is null which may occur if this partition is being created unattached.
        See Also:
        Partition.hasHeaderMetadata(), Partition.writeHeaderMetadata(Preface, long)

      • writeHeaderMetadata

        public void writeHeaderMetadata(Preface preface,
                                long headerByteCount)
                         throws NullPointerException,
                                InsufficientSpaceException,
                                IOException
        Description copied from interface: Partition

        Write the header metadata of this partition using that provided in the given preface. Previous header metadata will be overwritten. Note that sufficient space must be available.

        Specified by:
        writeHeaderMetadata in interface Partition
        headerByteCount - Number of bytes the encoded header should fit within, including filler.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Cannot associate null header metadata with this partition.
        InsufficientSpaceException - Calculations based on partition sizes shows that insufficient space is available to write this header metadata.
        IOException - Problem occurred writing to the filesystem.
        See Also:
        Partition.readHeaderMetadata(), Partition.hasHeaderMetadata(), #calculateMinimumHeaderMetadataSize(Preface)

        Specified by:

      • getInitialSize

        public long getInitialSize()
        Description copied from interface: Partition

        Returns the initial partition size given for this partition that is used to calculate the minimum allowed size for the partition. Note that this value does not necessarily reflect the actual size of the partition.

        Specified by:
        getInitialSize in interface Partition
        Returns:
        Initial partition size.
        See Also:
        Partition.SIZE_UNKNOWN, Partition.getActualSize()

      • setInitialDataSize

        public void setInitialDataSize(long initialSize)
        Description copied from interface: Partition

        Sets the initial partition size for this partition that is used to calculate the minimum allowed size for the partition. Use a value of Partition.SIZE_UNKNOWN to get MAJ to calculate the size. Note that the implementation will expand the size of the partition beyond the minimum given with this method if required. The size is specified excluding the size of the partition pack.

        Specified by:
        setInitialDataSize in interface Partition
        Parameters:
        initialSize - Initial partition size.
        See Also:
        Partition.SIZE_UNKNOWN, Partition.getActualSize()

      • getActualSize

        public long getActualSize()
        Description copied from interface: Partition

        Returns the current size allocated for the partition, including any fill. This size may be updated during writing.

        Specified by:
        getActualSize in interface Partition
        Returns:
        Current size allocated for the partition.
        See Also:
        Partition.getInitialSize()
